map

Interface IGrid

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Grid

    public interface IGrid
    Interface for methods to work with the grid
    Author:
    Josef Weldemariam, Matr. 7316168

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double addConstructionSite()
      adds a construction site to the grid witch is determine by the prim algorithm
      void addField(Field field)
      adds a field of type Field to the grid
      void addFieldMS2(Field field)
      implemented for house fields adds a field of type house or banquet hall to grid and connect it to the existing traffic network
      void addPipeCapacity()
      adds the pipe capacity and flow direction to every street field
      void addPipeCosts()
      adds the pipe costs to every street field
      void addStreet(int startNodeRowIndex, int startNodeColIndex, int endNodeRowIndex, int endNodeColIndex)
      adds a street to grid between two Nodes witch represents crossing
      DirectedGraph getDirGraph()
      returns the directed graph witch represented the pipe costs
      Field getField(int rowIndex, int colIndex)
      returns a field in grid with row Index rowIndex and column Index colIndex
      Field[][] getMap()
      returns the grid as a 2 dimensional array of type Field
      Field getRandomStreetField()
      returns a random street field and transform to Cartesian coordinates for cars
      Field getStreetField(Field f)
      returns the street field in front of a building implement for hospital, scrap yard, banquet hall, fire station and park returns field in Cartesian coordinates for cars
      UndirectedGraphMatrix getUndirGraph()
      returns the undirected graph witch represented the pipe costs
      void setSpeedLimit(int startNodeRowIndex, int startNodeColIndex, int endNodeRowIndex, int endNodeColIndex, int topspeed, int number)
      creates two new nodes and calls setSpeedLimit_number
      int x_Value(Field f) 
      int y_Value(Field f)

      • setSpeedLimit

        void setSpeedLimit(int startNodeRowIndex,
                   int startNodeColIndex,
                   int endNodeRowIndex,
                   int endNodeColIndex,
                   int topspeed,
                   int number)
        creates two new nodes and calls setSpeedLimit_number
        Parameters:
        startNodeRowIndex - row index of start node
        startNodeColIndex - column index of start node
        endNodeRowIndex - row index of end node
        endNodeColIndex - column index of end node
        topspeed - speed limit
        number - number of nodes witch belongs to the street
